mapper.select: SELECT A.BO_NO ABO_NO, BO_TITLE, BO_WRITER, BO_IP, BO_MAIL, BO_PASS, BO_CONTENT, BO_DATE, BO_HIT , ATT_NO, ATT_FILENAME, ATT_FANCYSIZE , ATT_DOWNLOAD , B.BO_NO FROM FREEBOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTATCH B ON A.BO_NO = B.BO_NO WHERE A.BO_NO=#{boNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE FREEBOARD SET BO_HIT = BO_HIT +1 WHERE BO_NO = #{boNo}
